Title: Includes certain violations involving the use of a firearm as qualifying offenses for the purpose of imposing bail
Summary: Includes certain violations involving the use of a machine-gun, firearm silencer, firearm, rifle, shotgun, disguised gun, ghost gun or assault weapon as qualifying offenses for the purpose of imposing bail.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to including certain violations involving the use of a firearm as qualifying offenses for the purpose of imposing bail
